input.sentences: i was ready to try the recipe .

output.sentences: I found this homemade recipe and I am ready to attempt it.
The dough I made by following it looked really perfect.
The dough is supposed to rise, nice and high, and it did.
I finished my seitan soup, which looked hearty and delicious.
My batch of homemade bread has turned out very well too.
